name: TrinityChristianCentre
0:
”Alexa, open trinity sermons”
”Alexa, ask trinity sermons for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start trinity sermons”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trinity sermons
des: Listen to the latest lectures and speaker series from Trinity Christian Centre. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
